preqs: It is recommended that students complete MGW1010 or MGG1010 before undertaking this unit

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGG1010, MGW1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGB2430, MGF2661, MGW2430}

description: Analysis of the strategic role of HRM in organisations, human resource planning, job design, staffing, performance management, training and development, reward systems, legal issues in employment, HR information systems, and the contribution of HRM to competitive advantage.
